Texts.Chs: 一个绘世者等离子锤，退役后用于展示。
Texts.Eng: A Skath Plasma Hammer, decommissioned for display.

Texts.Chs: 一把看起来很危险的大锤子。
Texts.Eng: A mighty dangerous lookin' Skath Hammer.

Texts.Chs: 像这样的锤子装有内部等离子加速器，用来粉碎动力装甲和车辆。只有最强大的绘世者才能在无人协助的情况下使用这些武器。
Texts.Eng: Hammers like these are fitted with an internal plasma accelerator, to crush power armour and vehicles both. Only the strongest Skath can wield these unassisted.

Texts.Chs: 我不认为我能举起这把锤子。。。
Texts.Eng: I don't think I could ever lift this hammer...

Texts.Chs: 这把锤子看起来特别重。绘世者是怎么挥舞它们的？。
Texts.Eng: This hammer looks extraordinarily heavy. How do the Skath even wield them?.

Texts.Chs: 这东西看起来很重。如果我试着提起它，我可能会摔断我的背。
Texts.Eng: This thing looks really heavy. If I tried to lift it, I might break my back.

Texts.Chs: 这种武器看起来是用来摧毁车辆和装甲的。
Texts.Eng: This weapon looks made to crush vehicles and power armour.

Texts.Chs: 水龙锤看起来很重。叶族人试图举起。叶族人失败了。
Texts.Eng: Waterdragon hammer looksss heavy. Floran triesss to lift. Floran failsss.
